4301.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
4301.description: A professor leads the kids to a spirit library in the middle of the desert, where Sokka hopes to discover powerful secrets to use against the Fire Nation.

4302.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
4302.description: Aang searches for Appa, while Katara struggles to keep everyone together so they can survive in the vast desert. Meanwhile, Uncle and Zuko seek help from an ancient secret society.

4352.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
4352.description: Sokka reviews the maps they acquired from the Spirit Library. After accidentally soaking the maps with a Waterbending bomb (similar to doing a cannonball in a pool), Katara uses her Waterbending to extract the water from the maps. The group then huddles around the map to discuss in which direction they should go – the Serpent's Pass appears to be the most direct route.

4353.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
4353.description: Aang discovers a secret Fire Nation super weapon heading straight for Ba Sing Se and must stop it before it destroys the great wall that protects the city from invasion. Meanwhile, Jet wishes to recruit Zuko for his Freedom Fighters, but learns a dangerous secret about him instead.

10399.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
10399.description: Sokka reviews the maps they acquired from the Spirit Library. After accidentally soaking the maps with a Waterbending bomb (similar to doing a cannonball in a pool), Katara uses her Waterbending to extract the water from the maps. The group then huddles around the map to discuss in which direction they should go – the Serpent's Pass appears to be the most direct route.

10400.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
10400.description: Aang discovers a secret Fire Nation super weapon heading straight for Ba Sing Se and must stop it before it destroys the great wall that protects the city from invasion. Meanwhile, Jet wishes to recruit Zuko for his Freedom Fighters, but learns a dangerous secret about him instead.

10450.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
10450.description: Aang and the kids finally arrive in Ba Sing Se to see the Earth King, only to find mysterious forces within the city conspiring to stop them. Meanwhile, Jet tries to find proof that Zuko and Uncle are Fire Nation.

10451.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
10451.description: A series of short stories, highlighting different characters and their individual adventures in the city. Tales of Katara and Toph, Uncle, Sokka, Aang, Zuko, and Momo.

16952.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
16952.description: Aang and the kids finally arrive in Ba Sing Se to see the Earth King, only to find mysterious forces within the city conspiring to stop them. Meanwhile, Jet tries to find proof that Zuko and Uncle are Fire Nation.

16953.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
16953.description: A series of short stories, highlighting different characters and their individual adventures in the city. Tales of Katara and Toph, Uncle, Sokka, Aang, Zuko, and Momo.

17003.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
17003.description: In this special episode, we go back in time to the moment Appa was stolen, and find out exactly what happened to him, and where's he's been all this time - and where he is now!

17004.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
17004.description: While searching for Appa, the kids run into Jet, but are torn about whether to trust him or not. Meanwhile, Zuko also hunts for Appa.

23522.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
23522.description: In this special episode, we go back in time to the moment Appa was stolen, and find out exactly what happened to him, and where's he's been all this time - and where he is now!

23523.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
23523.description: While searching for Appa, the kids run into Jet, but are torn about whether to trust him or not. Meanwhile, Zuko also hunts for Appa.

23573.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
23573.description: The kids battle Long Feng the Dai Li when they attempt to show the Earth King the vast conspiracy taking place in his city. Zuko becomes seriously ill and has feverish dreams as he faces a spiritual crisis.

23574.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
23574.description: Aang starts to learn control of the Avatar State from Guru Pathik at the Eastern Air Temple. Sokka is reunited with his father. Toph teaches herself "Metalbending" while Xin Fu and Master Yu are transporting Toph back to her parents. Katara and the generals plan the invasion of the Fire Nation. Later, she sees Zuko and Iroh running their tea shop.

29954.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
29954.description: The kids battle Long Feng the Dai Li when they attempt to show the Earth King the vast conspiracy taking place in his city. Zuko becomes seriously ill and has feverish dreams as he faces a spiritual crisis.

29955.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
29955.description: Aang starts to learn control of the Avatar State from Guru Pathik at the Eastern Air Temple. Sokka is reunited with his father. Toph teaches herself "Metalbending" while Xin Fu and Master Yu are transporting Toph back to her parents. Katara and the generals plan the invasion of the Fire Nation. Later, she sees Zuko and Iroh running their tea shop.

30006.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
30006.description: When Aang has a vision that Katara is in danger, Aang, Sokka, and Toph all rush back to Ba Sing Se to save her. They meet up with Iroh, who asks their help in saving Zuko who had been captured as well. As Aang and Iroh journey to the prison where Zuko and Katara are held, Toph and Sokka go to save the Earth King, but are captured by Azula. Aang and Katara are fighting Azula when Zuko shows up and helps Azula. They are overwhealmed by Zuko, Azula and the Dai Li. Aang prepares to let go of Katara to save her. Aang meditates as he rises in cosmic energy but is struck by Azula's lightning bolt and falls. The gang escapes Ba Sing Se and Katara revitalizes Aang using the water from the Spirit Oasis in the North Pole.

30007.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
30007.description: After sustaining serious injuries at the end of season two, Aang awakens to find himself aboard a Fire Nation ship. Meanwhile, Zuko journeys home.

36683.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
36683.description: When Aang has a vision that Katara is in danger, Aang, Sokka, and Toph all rush back to Ba Sing Se to save her. They meet up with Iroh, who asks their help in saving Zuko who had been captured as well. As Aang and Iroh journey to the prison where Zuko and Katara are held, Toph and Sokka go to save the Earth King, but are captured by Azula. Aang and Katara are fighting Azula when Zuko shows up and helps Azula. They are overwhealmed by Zuko, Azula and the Dai Li. Aang prepares to let go of Katara to save her. Aang meditates as he rises in cosmic energy but is struck by Azula's lightning bolt and falls. The gang escapes Ba Sing Se and Katara revitalizes Aang using the water from the Spirit Oasis in the North Pole.

36684.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
36684.description: After sustaining serious injuries at the end of season two, Aang awakens to find himself aboard a Fire Nation ship. Meanwhile, Zuko journeys home.

36734.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
36734.description: Mistaken for a Fire Nation School student, the disguised Aang is forced to enroll in a Fire nation school. Aang's hair helped to disguise him better with his head band. Meanwhile, Zuko and Iroh see each other again. Then Zuko hires Combustion man to kill Aang in secret.

36735.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
36735.description: When the gang comes to a suffering fishing village, a mysterious spirit appears to help the villagers.

43355.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
43355.description: Mistaken for a Fire Nation School student, the disguised Aang is forced to enroll in a Fire nation school. Aang's hair helped to disguise him better with his head band. Meanwhile, Zuko and Iroh see each other again. Then Zuko hires Combustion man to kill Aang in secret.

43356.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
43356.description: When the gang comes to a suffering fishing village, a mysterious spirit appears to help the villagers.

43406.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
43406.description: When Sokka feels he's not contributing enough to the group, he seeks out a mysterious master to teach him the ways of the sword.

43407.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
43407.description: Zuko, Azula, Mai, and Ty Lee go on vacation to Lo and Li's beach house, where they learn much about themselves and each other. Meanwhile, Aang and the rest of the team are being chased by a man, sent by Zuko, who fires explosive blasts with his mind from a tattoed "third eye".

49565.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
49565.description: When Sokka feels he's not contributing enough to the group, he seeks out a mysterious master to teach him the ways of the sword.

49566.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
49566.description: Zuko, Azula, Mai, and Ty Lee go on vacation to Lo and Li's beach house, where they learn much about themselves and each other. Meanwhile, Aang and the rest of the team are being chased by a man, sent by Zuko, who fires explosive blasts with his mind from a tattoed "third eye".

49616.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
49616.description: Aang and Zuko are taken on parallel adventures that give them insight into their forefathers' pasts - but how does the tale of Roku and Sozin matter to them now?

49617.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
49617.description: When Toph discovers a quick way to make cash, Katara disapproves, and the rift between them has disastrous consequences.

55811.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
55811.description: Aang and Zuko are taken on parallel adventures that give them insight into their forefathers' pasts - but how does the tale of Roku and Sozin matter to them now?

55812.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
55812.description: When Toph discovers a quick way to make cash, Katara disapproves, and the rift between them has disastrous consequences.

55862.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
55862.description: In a Halloween installment, the gang looks into strange disappearances in a spooky town. There, an old lady named Hama teaches Katara some secret Waterbending techniques.

55863.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
55863.description: On the eve of the eclipse, Aang's anxiety gets the better of him. His dreams become nightmares, and soon he can no longer tell dream from reality.

62469.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
62469.description: In a Halloween installment, the gang looks into strange disappearances in a spooky town. There, an old lady named Hama teaches Katara some secret Waterbending techniques.

62470.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
62470.description: On the eve of the eclipse, Aang's anxiety gets the better of him. His dreams become nightmares, and soon he can no longer tell dream from reality.

62520.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
62520.description: It is the Day of Black Sun and the group meets up with the invasion force."The day has finally arrived and Aang is ready to take on the Fire Lord. But they soon realize that things aren't going to go according to plan, and their surprise attack isn't so unexpected." Part 2 is "The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse."

62521.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
62521.description: Second part to "The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion". The eclipse has started and the gang only has a few minutes to get into an underground bunker and find and defeat Ozai. Zuko confront his father and learn about his mother's banishment while Aang, Sokka and Toph fight Azula and her Dai Li agents.

69019.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
69019.description: It is the Day of Black Sun and the group meets up with the invasion force."The day has finally arrived and Aang is ready to take on the Fire Lord. But they soon realize that things aren't going to go according to plan, and their surprise attack isn't so unexpected." Part 2 is "The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse."

69020.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
69020.description: Second part to "The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion". The eclipse has started and the gang only has a few minutes to get into an underground bunker and find and defeat Ozai. Zuko confront his father and learn about his mother's banishment while Aang, Sokka and Toph fight Azula and her Dai Li agents.

69070.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
69070.description: The gang leaves the Fire Nation, humbled and embarrassed by the failure of the invasion. They head to the Western Air Temple. However, unknown to them, Zuko is also following them in the hope of joining their group to teach Aang firebending.

69071.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
69071.description: Aang is ready to start his firebending training. However, as Zuko attempts to teach him, he realizes he has lost all his firebending power; as he is no longer drawing his firebending power from rage, anger and his desire to capture Aang. They journey to find the true source of firebending.

75395.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
75395.description: The gang leaves the Fire Nation, humbled and embarrassed by the failure of the invasion. They head to the Western Air Temple. However, unknown to them, Zuko is also following them in the hope of joining their group to teach Aang firebending.

75396.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
75396.description: Aang is ready to start his firebending training. However, as Zuko attempts to teach him, he realizes he has lost all his firebending power; as he is no longer drawing his firebending power from rage, anger and his desire to capture Aang. They journey to find the true source of firebending.

75447.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
75447.description: Sokka and Zuko break into The Boiling Rock Prison, the Fire Nation's highest security prison, to rescue Hakoda. When they develope an escape plan after finding Hakoda not there, other prisoners get involved and ruin it. Now the two, and a recently discovered Suki have to find another way out of the inescapable fortress.

75448.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
75448.description: This episode is continuing the jailbreak from the previous episode. Sokka, Hakoda, Zuko and Suki form a new escape plan, but it is complicated by the arrival of Princess Azula. In a desparate bid for freedom, the four escape due to the assitance of Mai.

81912.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
81912.description: Sokka and Zuko break into The Boiling Rock Prison, the Fire Nation's highest security prison, to rescue Hakoda. When they develope an escape plan after finding Hakoda not there, other prisoners get involved and ruin it. Now the two, and a recently discovered Suki have to find another way out of the inescapable fortress.

81913.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
81913.description: This episode is continuing the jailbreak from the previous episode. Sokka, Hakoda, Zuko and Suki form a new escape plan, but it is complicated by the arrival of Princess Azula. In a desparate bid for freedom, the four escape due to the assitance of Mai.

81964.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
81964.description: Katara and Zuko journey together to find the man responsible for the death of Katara's mother, Kya, who was killed in a Southern Water Tribe raid.

81965.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
81965.description: The gang goes to the theater to see a play about themselves, but are not happy with the production and the inaccurate portrayals of themselves.

88286.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
88286.description: Katara and Zuko journey together to find the man responsible for the death of Katara's mother, Kya, who was killed in a Southern Water Tribe raid.

88287.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
88287.description: The gang goes to the theater to see a play about themselves, but are not happy with the production and the inaccurate portrayals of themselves.

88338.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
88338.description: Aang finds out that Ozai plans to burn down the Earth Kingdom with an airship fleet. He disappears during the night, having sleepwalked onto a mysterious moving island. His friends cannot find him, and go to June for help. Meanwhile, Ozai is crowned Phoenix King.

88339.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
88339.description: The gang find Iroh with June's help. Iroh suggests that Zuko challenge Azula for the position of Fire Lord, with Katara to help. The others decide to intercept the airship fleet. Meanwhile, Aang comes to the conclusion that he must kill Ozai after talking to previous Avatars and finds out the island he was on was a Lion Turtle. The comet arrives at the end.

94162.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
94162.description: Aang finds out that Ozai plans to burn down the Earth Kingdom with an airship fleet. He disappears during the night, having sleepwalked onto a mysterious moving island. His friends cannot find him, and go to June for help. Meanwhile, Ozai is crowned Phoenix King.

94163.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
94163.description: The gang find Iroh with June's help. Iroh suggests that Zuko challenge Azula for the position of Fire Lord, with Katara to help. The others decide to intercept the airship fleet. Meanwhile, Aang comes to the conclusion that he must kill Ozai after talking to previous Avatars and finds out the island he was on was a Lion Turtle. The comet arrives at the end.

94214.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
94214.description: Sokka, Toph and Suki begin destroying the airship fleet. Aang duels Ozai, but is soon overwhelmed because of his reluctance to kill him. Zuko fights Azula in an Agni Kai, but is shot by lightning in the process of saving Katara from it.

94215.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
94215.description: Katara eventually defeats Azula by trapping her in ice, and heals Zuko. Sokka, Toph and Suki destroy the airship fleet. Aang defeats Ozai after going into the Avatar State and removes his bending abilities. Afterwards, Zuko is crowned Fire Lord. At the end, in Ba Sing Se, Aang and Katara kiss, ending the series.
